DOC.brief_summary: In this multi-center international study, our aim is to determine the effectiveness of HCQ for primary thrombosis prophylaxis in persistently aPL-positive but thrombosis-free patients without systemic autoimmune diseases.
DOC.brief_title: Hydroxychloroquine for the First Thrombosis Prevention in Antiphospholipid Antibody Positive Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Randomized to receive HCQ or no treatment in addition to their standard regimen. 11 study visits and 10 phone visits over 5 years.
